movies.title: Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo
movies.plot: Balung Wesi was defeated in battle and is seeking revenge on Ki Sapu Angin, the teacher of Jaka Sembung, The Warrior. In mobilizing power to fight the Dutch, The Warrior makes the acquaintance of Bajing Ireng (Black Ninja).
movies.simplePlot: Balung Wesi was defeated in battle and is seeking revenge on Ki Sapu Angin, the teacher of Jaka Sembung, The Warrior. In mobilizing power to fight the Dutch, The Warrior makes the acquaintance of Bajing Ireng (Black Ninja).

biography.bio: Barry Prima (real name Bertus Knoch) was born in Bandung, West Java, Indonesia. His father was a Dutch physician, his mother Indonesian. They had four children (three boys, one girl), with Bertus being the oldest. His sister graduated from Pajajaran University in Bandung with a medical degree and is a doctor, but Bertus only got his high school degree from Aloysius High School in Bandung. He learned taekwando in a small martial-arts studio located behind his father's house on Jalan Dago (Dago street). The taekwando master at that time was known as Master Kang, from Malaysia. In his early 20s, Bertus came to the attention of Indonesian producer Gope T. Samtani, who offered him a small role in a picture he was making about cannibals. Bertus took it, the picture--Savage Terror (1980)--became a hit and Samtani changed Bertus' name to Barry Prima. In his second film he played opposite renowned Indonesian star Suzzanna, as her husband who gets killed in the middle of the movie. Prima soon became the biggest star in Indonesian films, making a string of action/fantasy films for various studios. He made several pictures with Eva Arnaz and was briefly married to her. Famously reclusive, and somewhat ornery, he seldom gives interviews and in the few he has given often contradicts himself (many interviewers suspect he does it deliberately); he once said that he never wanted to be an actor and never made a good movie because the scripts were always so bad and the budgets were always so low, but later in the same interview he said that he enjoyed making films and liked everyone he worked with. After several years off the screen, he played a cameo (in drag!) in Upi Avianto's "Realita Cinta dan Rock 'n Roll" (2006).
biography.name: Barry Prima

biography.placeOfBirth: Bohorok, Oostkust van Sumatra, Dutch East Indies [now Bahorok, North Sumatra, Indonesia]
biography.bio: El Manik was born on November 17, 1949 in Bohorok, Oostkust van Sumatra, Dutch East Indies as Iman Ginting Manik. He is an actor, known for Love for Share (2006), Bintang Kejora (1986) and Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985).
biography.name: El Manik

biography.bio: Rita Zahara is an actress, known for Koral le justicier (1984), Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985) and Fadjar ditengah kabut (1966).
biography.name: Rita Zahara

biography.bio: Syamsuri Kaempuan is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), Escape from Hellhole (1983) and Manusia berilmu gai (1981).
biography.name: Syamsuri Kaempuan

biography.bio: Tizar Purbaya is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), La reine de la magie noire (1983) and Vaincre ou mourir (1985).
biography.name: Tizar Purbaya

biography.bio: Piet Pagau is an actor, known for Batas (2011), Lost in Papua (2011) and Hijrah Cinta (2014).
biography.name: Piet Pagau

biography.bio: Zurmaini is an actress, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985) and Le guerrier des ténèbres (1983).
biography.name: Zurmaini

biography.bio: Syamsuddin Syafei is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), The Warrior (1981) and Sangkuriang (1982).
biography.name: Syamsuddin Syafei

biography.bio: H. Kosim Betawi is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), Jakarta (1988) and Escape from Hellhole (1983).
biography.name: H. Kosim Betawi

biography.bio: Djair is an actor and writer, known for Special Silencers (1979), La bataille de l'enfer (1983) and Malaikat bayangan (1988).
biography.name: Djair

biography.bio: Donny Sabella is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), Si Rawing (1991) and Dia sang penakluk (1984).
biography.name: Donny Sabella

biography.bio: Fatima Maria is an actress, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985), Special Silencers (1979) and Ferocious Female Freedom Fighters, Part 2 (1982).
biography.name: Fatima Maria

biography.bio: Hassan Dollar is an actor, known for Intruder (1986), Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985) and Malaikat bayangan (1988).
biography.name: Hassan Dollar

biography.bio: Andi Maragau is an actor, known for Escape from Hellhole (1983) and Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985).
biography.name: Andi Maragau

biography.bio: Metty is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985).
biography.name: Metty
